mapper.sql: store_id, product_id, batch_id, amount, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE store_product_batch
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AND product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AND batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
